trans-unit.source: The base class for discoverable references using XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: A classe base para referências Detetáveis através da deteção de serviços Web de XML.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> all inherit from DiscoveryReference, and represent the three types of documents discoverable through XML Web services discovery: Service Descriptions, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and discovery documents, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference>, e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference>todos os herdar DiscoveryReference e representam os três tipos de documentos Detetáveis através da deteção de serviços Web de XML: descrições de serviço, esquemas de definição de esquema XML (XSD) e a deteção de documentos, respetivamente.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference></xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"></xref> used in a discovery process.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"> </xref> utilizadas no processo de deteção.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"></xref> used in a discovery process
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"> </xref> utilizadas no processo de deteção

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the default file to use when saving the referenced discovery document, XSD schema, or Service Description.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do ficheiro predefinido a utilizar quando guardar o documento de deteção referenciado, o esquema XSD ou a descrição do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Name of the default file to use when saving the referenced document.
trans-unit.target: Nome do ficheiro predefinido a utilizar quando guardar o documento referenciado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a file name based on the passed URL.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um nome de ficheiro com base no URL transmitido.

trans-unit.source: The URL on which the name of the file is based.
trans-unit.target: O URL em que o nome do ficheiro se baseia.

trans-unit.source: Name of the file based on the passed URL.
trans-unit.target: Nome do ficheiro com base no URL transmitido.

trans-unit.source: Reads the passed <xref:System.IO.Stream> and returns an instance of the class representing the type of referenced document.
trans-unit.target: Lê transmitido <xref:System.IO.Stream>e devolve uma instância da classe que representa o tipo de documento referenciado.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The return value is always an <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: O valor devolvido é sempre um <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: However, the underlying type varies, depending on the type of document referenced.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o tipo subjacente varia consoante o tipo de documento referenciado.

trans-unit.source: For instance, a <xref:System.IO.Stream> passed into <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.ReadDocument%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returns an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.IO.Stream>transmitido <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.ReadDocument%2A?displayProperty=fullName>devolve uma instância de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.ReadDocument%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream> containing the reference document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>que contém o documento de referência.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> with an underlying type matching the type of referenced document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>com um tipo subjacente correspondente ao tipo de documento referenciado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Downloads the referenced document at <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.Url*> to resolve whether the referenced document is valid.
trans-unit.target: Transfere o documento referenciado em <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.Url*>resolver se o documento referenciado é válido.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.Url*>

trans-unit.source: Downloads the referenced document and then invokes the overloaded Resolve member that takes a MIME type and a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Transfere o documento referenciado e, em seguida, invoca o membro Resolve sobrecarregado, que assume um tipo de MIME e <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: If the MIME type and the contents of `stream` match those expected by the reference type, then the contents of `stream` are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo de MIME e os conteúdos de `stream` correspondem às esperado pelo tipo de referência, em seguida, o conteúdo do `stream` são adicionados à <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>as propriedades da <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol*>

trans-unit.source: Resolves whether the referenced document is valid.
trans-unit.target: Resolve se o documento referenciado é válido.

trans-unit.source: If the MIME type and the contents of `stream` match those expected by the reference type, then the contents of `stream` are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo de MIME e os conteúdos de `stream` correspondem às esperado pelo tipo de referência, em seguida, o conteúdo do `stream` são adicionados à <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>as propriedades da <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MIME type of `stream`.
trans-unit.target: O tipo MIME de `stream`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> containing the referenced document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Stream>que contém o documento referenciado.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the referenced document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o URL do documento referenciado.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the referenced document.
trans-unit.target: O URL do documento referenciado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes the document to a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, escreve o documento <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The document to write into a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: O documento para escrever na <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> into which the `document` is written.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Stream>na qual o `document` é escrito.</xref:System.IO.Stream>
